translation: by listening, the many virtues are truly grasped
as one dives into their ocean-like depth
by listening, one takes on the fragrance of scholars and spiritual elders
and the dignity of true kingship
by listening, those who were blind in understanding
come to find the path they must walk
by listening, it comes within your reach
that which was once immeasurable and beyond grasp
by listening, pain and the stain of wrongdoing
